title: Organic Flow Vase
description: Beautiful handcrafted ceramic vase with organic flowing shapes and earthy glazes. Perfect for dried florals or as a statement decor piece.

title: Walnut & Maple Cutting Board
description: Handcrafted cutting board made from premium walnut and maple wood. Beautiful grain patterns and food-safe finish.

title: Vibrant Expression
description: Abstract painting with bold colors and expressive brushstrokes on canvas. A statement piece that enlivens any space.

title: Golden Hour Mountains
description: Stunning landscape photography print of mountains at golden hour. Available framed or unframed.

title: Ceramic Bowl Set
description: Handmade ceramic bowl set with unique glaze patterns in earthy tones. Set of 3 bowls, dishwasher safe.

title: Carved Jewelry Box
description: Exquisite handcrafted wooden jewelry box with intricate carved details. Features velvet-lined interior.
